name: Benjamin's Acceptance
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 42.
The theme is "Running out of Space", which is true emotionally and physically as the game progresses.

Benjamin's Acceptance is a game about doing what you think needs to be done, but letting everything else spiral out of control. 

Controls:

  • Left-click - on Benjamin's limbs, and drag to move
  • Right-click - and drag to rotate camera
  • R - Retart level
  • Escape - Quit game
